title: Science Learning Optimization Through Efficient Auditory Lecture Pace Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and specialized terminology
context.additional_context: Provides 15-minute microlearning modules via mobile devices, with pacing designed based on EEG research findings.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 90% comprehension when listening to 1.5x-speed auditory lectures.
Learners retain over 80% of knowledge in delayed assessments one week later under both 1.0x and 1.5x playback speeds.
Learners cultivate the ability to self-diagnose individual cognitive load levels and select optimal learning speeds.

resources: Specialized Audio Content for Science Subjects

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
